title: Temporary Activity visa
raw_text: ===== main placeholder ========================================== Subclass 408 Temporary Activity visa This visa allows you to come to Australia to do specific types of work on a short-term, temporary basis. Basic Eligibility You must have the skills to undertake the activity to be carried out in Australia be supported or sponsored meet additional requirements of the relevant stream Temporary Activity visa (subclass 408) Australian Government Endorsed Events This temporary visa lets you come to Australia to participate in events endorsed by the Australian Government. Stay For the duration of the event (or up to 4 years depending on your circumstances) Cost From AUD430.00 Free for participants of the Asian Football Confederation (AFC) Women's Asian Cup 2026 event. Processing Time For an indication of processing times for this visa, use the visa processing time guide tool . This will show the processing times for recently decided applications. It is a guide only and not specific to your application. ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​It is only for participation in certain events that have been endorsed by the Australian Government You can stay in Australia for the duration of the event, or up to 4 years ​ ​ Details Temporary Activity visa (subclass 408) Special Program This visa lets you stay in Australia to take part in an approved special program. Special programs can include youth exchange, cultural enrichment or community programs, school language assistants or "gap year school volunteering ". Stay Up to 12 months Cost From AUD430.00 Processing Time For an indication of processing times for this visa, use the visa processing time guide tool . This will show the processing times for recently decided applications. It is a guide only and not specific to your application. ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​Take part in a special program in Australia to exchange culture, knowledge and social experiences Stay in Australia for usually up to 12 months with members of your family unit Apply for the visa in or outside Australia, but not in immigration clearance Details Temporary Activity visa (subclass 408) Religious Work This visa lets you do full-time religious work for a religious institution in Australia. You and your family who apply for the visa with you can stay here for up to 2 years. Stay Up to 2 years Cost From AUD430.00 Processing Time For an indication of processing times for this visa, use the visa processing time guide tool . This will show the processing times for recently decided applications. It is a guide only and not specific to your application. ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​Do full-time religious work to serve a religious institution in Australia Stay in Australia for up to 2 years with members of your family unit Apply for the visa in or outside Australia, but not in immigration clearance Details Temporary Activity visa (subclass 408) Research activities This visa lets you observe or take part in a research project at a research or tertiary institution in Australia. You and your family who apply for the visa with you can stay here for up to 2 years. Stay The applicant can be granted a period of stay in Australia of up to two years Cost From AUD430.00 Processing Time For an indication of processing times for this visa, use the visa processing time guide tool . This will show the processing times for recently decided applications. It is a guide only and not specific to your application. ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​Observe or take part in an Australian research project Stay in Australia for up to 2 years with members of your family unit Apply for the visa in or outside Australia, but not in immigration clearance Details Temporary Activity visa (subclass 408) Invited for other social and cultural activity (Invited Participant) This visa lets you come to Australia if you are invited to participate in a community-based event, including sporting events. You and your family who travel on the visa with you can stay here for up to 3 months. Stay Up to 3 months Cost From AUD430.00 Processing Time For an indication of processing times for this visa, use the visa processing time guide tool . This will show the processing times for recently decided applications. It is a guide only and not specific to your application. ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​You must have been invited to take part in a community-based event in Australia You can stay in Australia for up to 3 months with members of your family unit You can apply for the visa in or outside Australia, but not in immigration clearance Details Temporary Activity visa (subclass 408) Sporting Activities This visa allows you to play, coach, instruct or adjudicate for an Australian team, or do high level sports training with a sporting organisation. You and your family can stay in Australia for up to 2 years. Stay Up to 2 years Cost From AUD430.00 Processing Time For an indication of processing times for this visa, use the visa processing time guide tool . This will show the processing times for recently decided applications. It is a guide only and not specific to your application. ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​Play, coach, instruct or adjudicate for an Australian team, or do high-level sports training with a sporting organisation Stay for up to 2 years with members of your family unit Apply for the visa in or outside Australia, but not in immigration clearance Details Temporary Activity visa (subclass 408) Entertainment Activities This temporary visa lets you come to Australia to work in the entertainment industry on film, television or live productions as a performer, production or support staff. You can include family members in your visa application. Stay Up to 2 years Cost From AUD430.00 Processing Time For an indication of processing times for this visa, use the visa processing time guide tool . This will show the processing times for recently decided applications. It is a guide only and not specific to your application. ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​Work on film, television or live productions in the entertainment industry Stay in Australia for up to 2 years with members of your family unit Apply for the visa in or outside Australia, but not in immigration clearance Details Temporary Activity visa (subclass 408) Superyacht Crew This visa lets you work in Australia as a crew member of a superyacht. You can stay here for up to 12 months. Stay Up to 12 months Cost AUD430.00 Processing Time For an indication of processing times for this visa, use the visa processing time guide tool . This will show the processing times for recently decided applications. It is a guide only and not specific to your application. ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​Be a crew member on a superyacht in Australia Stay in Australia for up to 12 months Apply for the visa in or outside Australia, but not in immigration clearance Details Temporary Activity visa (subclass 408) Exchange Arrangements This visa lets you come to Australia as part of a staff exchange with an Australian organisation. You and your family members who travel here on the visa with you can stay for up to 2 years. Stay Up to 2 years Cost From AUD430.00 Processing Time For an indication of processing times for this visa, use the visa processing time guide tool . This will show the processing times for recently decided applications. It is a guide only and not specific to your application. ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​Take part in a staff exchange and work in an Australian organisation Stay in Australia for up to 2 years with members of your family unit Apply for the visa in or outside Australia, but not in immigration clearance Details Temporary Activity visa (subclass 408) Domestic work for executives This visa lets you come to Australia to do full-time domestic work in the household of certain senior foreign executives. You and members of your family unit can stay here for up to 2 years. Stay Up to 2 years Cost From AUD430.00 Processing Time For an indication of processing times for this visa, use the visa processing time guide tool . This will show the processing times for recently decided applications. It is a guide only and not specific to your application. ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​Do full-time domestic work in an Australian household of certain senior foreign executives Stay in Australia for up 2 years with members of your family unit Apply for the visa in or outside Australia, but not in immigration clearance Details
main_content:
===== main placeholder ==========================================

Subclass 408

Subclass 408

# Temporary Activity visa

Temporary Activity visa

This visa allows you to come to Australia to do specific types of work on a short-term, temporary basis.

This visa allows you to come to Australia to do specific types of work on a short-term, temporary basis.

### Basic Eligibility

Basic Eligibility

You must

You must
- have the skills to undertake the activity to be carried out in Australia
have the skills to undertake the activity to be carried out in Australia
- be supported or sponsored
be supported or sponsored
- meet additional requirements of the relevant stream
meet additional requirements of the relevant stream
Temporary Activity visa (subclass 408)

## Australian Government Endorsed Events

Australian Government Endorsed Events
This temporary visa lets you come to Australia to participate in events endorsed by the Australian Government.
Stay

For the duration of the event (or up to 4 years depending on your circumstances)

For the duration of the event (or up to 4 years depending on your circumstances)
Cost

FromAUD430.00

From
AUD430.00

Free for participants of the Asian Football Confederation (AFC) Women's Asian Cup 2026 event.

Free for participants of the Asian Football Confederation (AFC) Women's Asian Cup 2026 event.
Processing Time

For an indication of processing times for this visa, use thevisa processing time guide tool. This will show the processing times for recently decided applications. It is a guide only and not specific to your application.

For an indication of processing times for this visa, use the
visa processing time guide tool
. This will show the processing times for recently decided applications. It is a guide only and not specific to your application.
- ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​It is only for participation in certain events that have been endorsed by the Australian Government
​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​It is only for participation in certain events that have been endorsed by the Australian Government
- You       can stay in Australia for the duration of the event, or up to 4 years
You       can stay in Australia for the duration of the event, or up to 4 years
​ ​
Details
Temporary Activity visa (subclass 408)

## Special Program

Special Program
This visa lets you stay in Australia to take part in an approved special program. Special programs can include youth exchange, cultural enrichment or community programs, school language assistants or "gap year school volunteering ".
Stay

Up to 12 months

Up to 12 months
Cost

FromAUD430.00

From
AUD430.00
Processing Time

For an indication of processing times for this visa, use thevisa processing time guide tool. This will show the processing times for recently decided applications. It is a guide only and not specific to your application.

For an indication of processing times for this visa, use the
visa processing time guide tool
. This will show the processing times for recently decided applications. It is a guide only and not specific to your application.
- ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​Take part in a special program in Australia to exchange culture, knowledge and social experiences
​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​Take part in a special program in Australia to exchange culture, knowledge and social experiences
- Stay in Australia for usually up to 12 months with members of your family unit
Stay in Australia for usually up to 12 months with members of your family unit
- Apply for the visa in or outside Australia, but not in immigration clearance
Apply for the visa in or outside Australia, but not in immigration clearance
Details
Temporary Activity visa (subclass 408)

## Religious Work

Religious Work
This visa lets you do full-time religious work for a religious institution in Australia. You and your family who apply for the visa with you can stay here for up to 2 years.
Stay

Up to 2 years

Up to 2 years
Cost

FromAUD430.00

From
AUD430.00
Processing Time

For an indication of processing times for this visa, use thevisa processing time guide tool. This will show the processing times for recently decided applications. It is a guide only and not specific to your application.

For an indication of processing times for this visa, use the
visa processing time guide tool
. This will show the processing times for recently decided applications. It is a guide only and not specific to your application.
- ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​Do full-time religious work to serve a religious institution in Australia
​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​Do full-time religious work to serve a religious institution in Australia
- Stay in Australia for up to 2 years with members of your family unit
Stay in Australia for up to 2 years with members of your family unit
- Apply for the visa in or outside Australia, but not in immigration clearance
Apply for the visa in or outside Australia, but not in immigration clearance
Details
Temporary Activity visa (subclass 408)

## Research activities

Research activities
This visa lets you observe or take part in a research project at a research or tertiary institution in Australia. You and your family who apply for the visa with you can stay here for up to 2 years.
Stay

The applicant can be granted a period of stay in Australia of up to two years

The applicant can be granted a period of stay in Australia of up to two years
Cost

FromAUD430.00

From
AUD430.00
Processing Time

For an indication of processing times for this visa, use thevisa processing time guide tool. This will show the processing times for recently decided applications. It is a guide only and not specific to your application.

visa processing time guide tool
. This will show the processing times for recently decided applications. It is a guide only and not specific to your application.

​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​Observe or take part in an Australian research project
- Stay in Australia for up to 2 years with members of your family unit
Stay in Australia for up to 2 years with members of your family unit
- Apply for the visa in or outside Australia, but not in immigration clearance
Apply for the visa in or outside Australia, but not in immigration clearance
Details
Temporary Activity visa (subclass 408)

## Invited for other social and cultural activity (Invited Participant)

Invited for other social and cultural activity (Invited Participant)
This visa lets you come to Australia if you are invited to participate in a community-based event, including sporting events. You and your family who travel on the visa with you can stay here for up to 3 months.
Stay

Up to 3 months

Up to 3 months
Cost

FromAUD430.00

From
AUD430.00
Processing Time

For an indication of processing times for this visa, use thevisa processing time guide tool. This will show the processing times for recently decided applications. It is a guide only and not specific to your application.

For an indication of processing times for this visa, use the
visa processing time guide tool
. This will show the processing times for recently decided applications. It is a guide only and not specific to your application.
- ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​You must have been invited to take part in a community-based event in Australia
​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​You must have been invited to take part in a community-based event in Australia
- You can stay in Australia for up to 3 months with members of your family unit
You can stay in Australia for up to 3 months with members of your family unit
- You can apply for the visa in or outside Australia, but not in immigration clearance
You can apply for the visa in or outside Australia, but not in immigration clearance

## Sporting Activities

Sporting Activities
This visa allows you to play, coach, instruct or adjudicate for an Australian team, or do high level sports training with a sporting organisation. You and your family can stay in Australia for up to 2 years.
Stay

Up to 2 years

Up to 2 years
Cost

FromAUD430.00

From
AUD430.00

​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​Play, coach, instruct or adjudicate  for an Australian team, or do high-level sports training with a sporting organisation

Stay for up to 2 years with members of your family unit
- Apply for the visa in or outside Australia, but not in immigration clearance
Apply for the visa in or outside Australia, but not in immigration clearance

Entertainment Activities
This temporary visa lets you come to Australia to work in the entertainment industry on film, television or live productions as a performer, production or support staff. You can include family members in your visa application.

This visa lets you come to Australia as part of a staff exchange with an Australian organisation. You and your family members who travel here on the visa with you can stay for up to 2 years.

Domestic work for executives
This visa lets you come to Australia to do full-time domestic work in the household of certain senior foreign executives. You and members of your family unit can stay here for up to 2 years.
